name: Arikeade🥰
greetingText2: Today is about you. I can’t wait to celebrate you all day long!😊
wishText: As you blow out the candles on your birthday cake, I wish you all the happiness, success, and fulfillment your heart desires. You are a true gem, and I am lucky to know you. May this year bring you more adventures, more laughter, and more unforgettable experiences.
textInChatBox: “The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.” – Hubert H. Humphrey. Happy birthday to my amazing friend. May our bond continue to grow stronger with each passing year.
text2: I'm not quite done😂, Just getting started...😁
text3: Happy Birthday to the girl who brings out the best in me...😌🤭
text4: Happy birthday to the prettiest and realest girl I know...😏
text5Entry: You are special and you mean a lot me💖
text5Content: You have a heart of gold, and you make the world a better place just by being in it🥰
outroText: Just wanted to do something different this time😁 Hope you liked it. Enjoy your day
replayText: Click here to watch it again.
